statements: SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms;
SELECT id, algorithm FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms WHERE votes > 10;
SELECT algorithm, votes FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms ORDER BY votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms WHERE algorithm = 'POA';
SELECT id, algorithm, votes FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms WHERE votes > 100 ORDER BY algorithm DESC;
SELECT algorithm, SUM(votes) AS total_votes FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms GROUP BY algorithm HAVING total_votes > 500;
SELECT id, algorithm FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id;
SELECT algorithm, COUNT(*) AS total_voting_methods FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms GROUP BY algorithm ORDER BY total_voting_methods DESC;
SELECT MAX(votes) AS max_votes FROM consensus_voting_mechanisms;
SELECT * FROM Consensus_Algorithms;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM Consensus_Algorithms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mechanism_name AS VotingMechanism, purpose AS Reason FROM Voting_Mechanisms;
SELECT id, algorithm_name, description FROM Consensus_Algorithms WHERE algorithm_name LIKE '%PBFT%';
SELECT * FROM Voting_Mechanisms ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, algorithm_name, description FROM Consensus_Algorithms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT algorithm_name, description, id FROM Consensus_Algorithms WHERE algorithm_name LIKE '%PBFT%';
SELECT * FROM Voting_Mechanisms WHERE purpose = 'Governance' ORDER BY mechanism_name DESC;
SELECT id, mechanism_name FROM Voting_Mechanisms WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT mechanism_name, purpose FROM Voting_Mechanisms WHERE mechanism_name IN ('Plurality', 'Approval') ORDER BY purpose ASC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithms;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM consensus_algorithms WHERE id = 2;
SELECT network_name, mechanism_name, voting_type FROM blockchain_network WHERE consensus_id = 1;
SELECT network_name FROM blockchain_network ORDER BY voting_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_mechanisms WHERE mechanism_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithms;
SELECT network_id, network_name FROM blockchain_network ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM consensus_algorithms WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM voting_mechanisms WHERE mechanism_name LIKE '%z';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE consensus_id = 1 AND voting_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithms;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM consensus_algorithms WHERE version > 2.0;
SELECT network_name, genesis_block_hash FROM blockchain_networks WHERE consensus_algorithm_id = 1;
SELECT mechanism_name, quorum FROM voting_mechanisms ORDER BY mechanism_name DESC;
SELECT id, block_id, timestamp FROM block_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM block_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT network_name, consensus_algorithm_id FROM blockchain_networks WHERE id IN (1, 5, 8);
SELECT id, algorithm_name, version FROM consensus_algorithms WHERE version > 1.0 ORDER BY version ASC;
SELECT mechanism_name, description, quorum FROM voting_mechanisms WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT bt.id, bt.block_id, bt.timestamp, bn.network_name FROM block_transactions bt JOIN blockchain_networks bn ON bt.block_id = bn.id ORDER BY bt.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_member;
SELECT member_name, member_address FROM voting_member WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM consensus_algorithm ORDER BY algorithm_id DESC;
SELECT chain_name FROM blockchain WHERE current_block_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM block WHERE algorithm_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM voting_member WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT vote_id, member_id, algorithm_id, vote_decision FROM vote WHERE vote_decision = 'approve';
SELECT member_name, member_address FROM voting_member ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT chain_id, chain_name, current_block_id FROM blockchain WHERE current_block_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE LENGTH(description) > 10;
